Contraction: If you fail an Average (+20) Endurance Test after being bitten by an infected mosquito. If infected blood is injected or imbibed, you contract Bronze Fever automatically.
Description: Bronze Fever is more commonly found in the southern Old World, in more warm and humid climes, where it is spread via insect bites. Most afflicted will recover in a matter of days, but on rare occasions it can lead to complications, and even death.
